verbose_text: Our previous study revealed that that ALP activity of PDLSCs was significantly increased following transfection with ephrinB2 in vitro, which resulted in more calcified nodules and increased expression levels of osteogenesis associated genes (BSP, COL1, Runx2, DSPP and OCN), suggesting that upregulation of ephrinB2 promoted the osteogenic differentiation of PDLSCs.
